list.Title: Protect, detect, investigate, and respond to advanced threats
list.Details: The cyberthreat landscape today requires an ongoing and relentless focus on security, and IT administrators need tools that help them prevent, protect, defend, and respond to threats in addition to modernizing their workplace to empower employee creativity and productivity. Windows Defender in Windows 10 Enterprise changes the game for security in organizations by protecting user identities, information, and devices from threats, with a comprehensive and fully integrated set of advanced security capabilities. Windows Defender provides both pre-breach threat resistance, removing or defending against the attack vectors used by the malware and hacking industry, and post-breach protection, detection, and response capabilities, all within a single end-to-end solution.

list.Details: Use automated tools to streamline the process of gathering and transforming data so that you can spend more time on working on financial analysis and driving impact.

list.Title: Automate financial processes by using integrated workflows
list.Details: Work less and achieve more by using workflow tools to automate common, repetitive financial processes.

list.Title: Easily and accurately perform financial analysis
list.Details: Inspire confidence from your clients or your team by analyzing your data quickly and accurately.

list.Title: Use custom tools to streamline financial processes
list.Details: Speed up your data-gathering, analysis, and reporting processes with customized tools you can access from almost any device.

list.Title: Connect with transportation crew coworkers in real time
list.Details: Communicate instantly with other members of your flight crew, transit drivers, and transportation personnel in real time, no matter where you are.

list.Title: Focus on selling by automating routine administrative tasks
list.Details: Increase your productivity by saving time on administrative tasks, so that you can spend more time selling.

list.Title: Customize sales presentations to meet customer needs
list.Details: Quickly tailor presentations to meet the needs of your customers.

list.Title: Engage customers more effectively
list.Details: Quickly respond to customer emails, stay on top of leads, and conduct “face-to-face” meetings and product demos to grow customer relationships.

list.Title: Build a cohesive sales team to meet and beat revenue targets
list.Details: Leverage digital collaboration and performance tools to bring sales reps together in a cohesive sales team that consistently meets and exceeds targets.

list.Title: Use integrated tools to improve your sales teams productivity
list.Details: Drive your sales team to success by giving them quick access to the tools, people, and information they need.

list.Title: Build a customer advocacy community
list.Details: Advocate effectively for your customers by engaging with them in a social network and sharing your insights across the company.

list.Title: Plan and carry out a successful product launch
list.Details: Streamline the planning and implementation of a product launch by using intuitive scheduling and collaboration tools.

list.Title: Quickly create a polished and compelling marketing presentation
list.Details: Catch your customers interest with a polished presentation, without relying on expensive and time-consuming professional design services.

list.Title: Track campaign performance with interactive visuals
list.Details: Share your marketing campaigns progress with up-to-the-minute data presented in compelling and easy-to-read visuals.

list.Title: Build a winning marketing strategy
list.Details: Use intuitive tools to quickly conduct research, summarize your findings, and develop and present a winning strategy to your stakeholders.

list.Title: Engage employees with interactive online training
list.Details: Quickly create engaging, interactive training, and make training resources available in a central repository for on-demand access.

list.Title: Streamline common HR processes by using intelligent tools
list.Details: Take the repetitiveness out of onboarding new employees, reviewing employee policies, and other HR tasks by creating automated workflows and using intelligent tools.

list.Title: Analyze and visualize HR data with powerful, intuitive tools
list.Details: Quickly import and analyze your data with powerful data analysis tools, and create beautiful reports that you share in interactive dashboards.

list.Title: Build consensus on financial analysis within your team
list.Details: Bring your team together in a chat-based workspace to discuss analysis strategies, build consensus, and expedite decision-making.

list.Title: Expedite decision-making by meeting with clients in real time
list.Details: Meet with your financial clients on their time, using the communication style that works best for their needs.

list.Title: Engage with internal experts to optimize your sales content
list.Details: Move prospects through the sales funnel by working with your companys product and customer experts to craft compelling, focused sales content

list.Title: Manage resources and scheduling to coordinate a team sale
list.Details: Organize the tasks and resources needed to bring a team sale to fruition by leveraging powerful, intuitive project management tools.

list.Title: Create high-quality sales reports
list.Details: Develop sales reports that provide value-add by using templates, intelligently designed charts, and cinematic motion.

list.Title: Use industry-leading security to stay productive in the field
list.Details: Work securely and efficiently—whether you are in the office or in the field—by accessing the sales apps and data you need from your device.

list.Title: Broadcast company town halls to engage employees remotely
list.Details: Bring your company’s local and remote employees together for a "town hall" meeting to engage employees at every level.

list.Title: Create a patient care plan
list.Details: Bring the whole medical team together to securely create the optimal care plan for your patient.

list.Title: Manage your nursing shift from your device
list.Details: Use your smartphone or other device to view your schedule, request time off or swap shifts, and keep up with news and events.

list.Title: Protect patient and hospital data while making it accessible
list.Details: Make patient and hospital data accessible to mobile staff while keeping that data more secure with appropriate permissions, policies, and access management.

list.Title: Prepare for a corporate earnings release
list.Details: Prepare for a successful earnings release by bringing people, content, and tools together in a mobile-friendly chat-based workspace that empowers team members to move quickly from chats to content and tasks, with context, continuity, and transparency among the entire team.

list.Title: Stay organized, productive, and safe while on the internet
list.Details: Safely find and download the data and resources you need by browsing the web with Microsoft Edge, the faster, safer browser designed for Windows 10.

list.Title: Stay ahead of the game with a personal digital assistant
list.Details: Count on Cortana in Windows 10 to remind you of important meetings and deadlines, to help you keep in touch with coworkers and supervisors even when youre on the move, and to quickly search your devices and the internet to find the information you need.

list.Title: Engage customers with a personalized banking experience
list.Details: Use secure, light, and mobile Windows 10 devices and integrated Office 365 apps to step out from behind your desk and bring full-service banking to your customers wherever they are—such as in the bank lobby or at their location.

list.Title: Use integrated apps and devices to improve patient care
list.Details: Gain secure, speedy access to lab results, specialist recommendations, patient notes, scheduling, and more from your Microsoft 365 powered device and your clinics integrated apps.

list.Title: Securely work with data and ideas from the factory floor
list.Details: Maximize your productivity on the factory floor by using your Microsoft 365 powered device to connect to data, coordinate with coworkers, and use digital ink and 3D modeling to brainstorm new ideas.

list.Title: Serve customers quickly and securely from the sales floor
list.Details: Answer customer questions and close sales right from the sales floor with confidence by using your Microsoft 365 powered device and your stores integrated apps.

list.Title: Plan a summit by using mobile scheduling
list.Details: Use mobile communication and scheduling tools to successfully manage staffing at a summit.

list.Title: Keep devices always up to date
list.Details: Windows as a service enables Windows 10 to keep itself up to date for the lifetime of your devices through simple, always-improving updating processes, with high levels of application compatibility, minimal effort and cost, and—most importantly—no more big deployment projects.

list.Title: Get actionable insights about upgrade readiness
list.Details: For IT pros who provide support to the business by delivering apps that enhance the agility of the organization, planning for operating system upgrades can be a challenge. Windows Analytics provides powerful upgrade readiness insights and recommendations about the computers, apps, and drivers in your organization. These insights allow app owners and IT teams to identify compatibility issues that can block an upgrade, implement fixes that are known to Microsoft, and accelerate deployment of Microsoft 365.

list.Title: Quickly and easily transform new devices
list.Details: Windows AutoPilot capabilities enable the quick and easy transformation of new devices into enterprise-ready machines, without imaging and with the flexibility to satisfy the needs of organizations of all shapes and sizes. This process can be done by the users themselves—without IT ever touching the device—when the organization uses technologies such as Azure Active Directory, Microsoft Intune, third-party MDM services, and the Windows AutoPilot device enrollment service.

list.Title: Easily and securely manage devices
list.Details: The use of personal devices for work, in addition to the increase in the number of employees who work outside the office, is changing how organizations manage mobile devices. Windows 10 helps to manage devices efficiently and cost effectively while reducing business disruptions, as you make new devices available to your employees. You can use the same management tools that you are familiar with today to manage all types of devices running Windows 10—including traditional desktops, laptops, and tablets. Support for traditional deep manageability is available through technologies like Active Directory, Group Policy, and System Center Configuration Manager, and modern management that uses cloud-based device management solutions such as Microsoft Enterprise Mobility + Security (EMS).

list.Title: Bridge the gap between sales and marketing
list.Details: Improve your deal-closing rate by working more closely with marketing to generate and follow up on hot leads.

list.Title: Quickly gain consensus on sales team budgets
list.Details: Get together with other sales reps, no matter where they are, to get traction on your annual budget by using digital meeting solutions.

list.Title: Analyze and streamline your workday
list.Details: Shift your sales career into high gear by using analytics and productivity tools to optimize your performance.

list.Title: Quickly visualize your sales data
list.Details: Share compelling sales data visualizations and dashboards with your team for better collaboration.

list.Title: Interview more candidates with greater efficiency
list.Details: Broaden your organizations candidate pool nationally and globally, without lengthy interview processes and the expense of in-person interviews.

list.Title: Tap collective knowledge to develop a benefits plan
list.Details: Collaborate with benefits vendors, financial stakeholders, and corporate decision makers to develop a new benefits plan.

list.Title: Coauthor a new employee handbook
list.Details: Work together in a single document with your team to create a new employee handbook.

list.Title: Manage a new HR policy rollout
list.Details: Roll out a new policy on time and on target by managing your resources and scheduling in an intuitive, team-based environment.

list.Title: Manage contractors with mobile scheduling
list.Details: Use mobile communication and scheduling tools to manage contract worker staffing at an event.

list.Title: Easily visualize workforce diversity data
list.Details: Evaluate your company’s diversity data more easily with compelling visualizations and dashboards.

list.Title: Keep up with recruiting when offsite
list.Details: Access candidate data securely when you are offsite or offline, and share and collaborate with other recruiters.

list.Title: Fuel your creativity with powerful devices and apps
list.Details: Use Surface Studio and Windows 10 to transform the way you sketch, model, and share your creative ideas.

list.Title: Use your device like a PC to stay productive and secure
list.Details: Maintain the high level of productivity you need, wherever you are, by leveraging the seamless, secure mobile experience offered by Windows 10.

list.Title: Store employee data with industry-standard compliance
list.Details: Protect employee data with security and privacy policies, and ensure easy access to independent compliance reports and assessments.

list.Title: Streamline lab operations while ensuring compliance
list.Details: Improve your lab’s testing operations and ensure regulatory compliance by using powerful, modern devices.
